name: Monsters of ancient ruins
description: The legends didn't lie. The first monsters appeared completely silent from behind the destroyed building. Although I was ready for anything, the sight of a monster frightened me, shackled all my muscles for a few seconds with fear. Breathing hard, I drew my pistol and fired the entire clip at the monster. He collapsed heavily to the ground. After reloading my weapon, I began to wait for the other monsters that appeared behind the trees.
